title: Mathematics Microlearning Course Designed with CIMO-Based SoTL Methodology

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical competency (basic operations, statistical concepts)
context.additional_context: CIMO Logic Model-Based Course Design for Learner-Led Inquiry Activities

learning_goals: Learners can analyze mathematics education problems using the four elements (context-intervention-mechanism-outcome) of the CIMO model
Learners apply real-life problem-solving strategies through 10-minute microlearning modules in mobile environments
Learners demonstrate learning outcomes through peer assessment and project deliverables (portfolios)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
